definition: to agree/to decide after consultation/to come to a compromise
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Use agreed-upon acceptance tests to increase your confidence prior to hand-off.
sentences.chinese: 在放手之前，使用商定的驗收測試來增加您的信心。
我們必須商定共同的方向。

sentences.english: Multimode and silk aram put on the first bought ring, and was agreed.
sentences.chinese: 多模和絲蘭戴上了最初買的戒指，並商定娶親。

sentences.english: In this sense, Pakatan Rakyat and SAPP can work out and agree on the seat allocation.
sentences.chinese: 這樣民聯和進步黨就能夠互相商定席位的分配。

sentences.english: The objective is to decide how you plan to handle situations according to your agreed-upon values.
sentences.chinese: 目標是決定您計劃如何根據您商定的價值來處理情況。

sentences.english: Moreover, Huang Jingao had developed secret codes with the mistresses .
sentences.chinese: 此外，黃金高還與每位情婦都商定了幽會暗號。

sentences.english: Trying to agree where to go on holiday set the family by the ears.
sentences.chinese: 試圖商定去哪裏度假，結果造成了家庭不和。

sentences.english: We are scheming to secretly cross the enemy territory.
sentences.chinese: 我們在祕密商定穿越敵佔區的計劃。

sentences.english: They agreed to together and confront the difficult.
sentences.chinese: 他們商定爲了在一同，共同面對艱難。

sentences.english: The parties concerned agreed to hold the Fifth Round of Six-Party Talks in Beijing in early November.
sentences.chinese: 各方商定11月上旬在北京舉行第五輪北京六方會談。

sentences.english: That compares with an annualized return of about 10% for a typical agreed-on deal.
sentences.chinese: 比較而言，一般商定交易的年化收益率在10%左右。

sentences.english: Once the final passage across the banks agreed in the corner.
sentences.chinese: 曾經的商定終極流逝在隔岸的轉角。

sentences.english: Donat forget to ever of the contrserve then we left things.
sentences.chinese: 別忘了也曾的商定，那時我們僅剩的東西。

sentences.english: Chunk up to review and agree the project.
sentences.chinese: 從整體上覆審和商定最終的項目。

sentences.english: A discussion ensued and the agreed strategy was to check the connections on the fuel pump.
sentences.chinese: 隨後進行了討論和商定的戰略是要檢查燃油泵的連接。

sentences.english: So all we have to do now is finalise the delivery arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 那麼我們現在要做的就是商定交貨的安排了。

definition: to reach an agreement/to agree upon
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to consult/to discuss seriously/to negotiate/to confer/negotiations/consultations

to agree on sth (after discussion)/to conclude a bargain/to arrange/to promise/to stipulate/to make an appointment/stipulated (time, amount, quality etc)/an arrangement/a deal/appointment/undertaking/commitment/understanding/engagement/stipulation
to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks
to come to a decision/to fix on (a date etc)/to determine/to finalize/to nail down (a deal etc)
